drivers.name: epson
drivers.comments: This driver is available in the Ghostscript Printer Application

notes:
This is a GDI (winprinter) printer/scanner/copier, with ESC/P support
Could only get it working under Unix with esc/p (the Ghostscript epson driver), - output is in b/w 360x180dpi :(
Scanning won't work at all.

Consumables/Refills: 4 cartridges, 3 colour, 1 black
